items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: gli.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides a simplified alternative to jQuery. It offers a range of useful functions to manipulate the DOM, handle events, and perform various operations on elements.

items.content_html: This is a simple coming soon template built with Next.js and TailwindCSS. It is a lightweight and responsive template that can be used for various projects that require a "coming soon" page.

items.content_html: Task-Wise is a lightweight and intuitive to-do list application built with React.js, leveraging the power of the Context API for state management. With a clean and minimalist user interface, Task Wsie allows users to efficiently organize their tasks and stay on top of their daily goals.
items.title: sarthakvijayvargiya/Task-Wise: Task-Wise is a lightweight and intuitive to-do list application built with React.js, leveraging the power of the Context API for state management. With a clean and minimalist user interface, Task Wsie allows users to efficiently organize their tasks and stay on top of their daily goals.
